headline.main: In Reversal, SXSW Festival Plans Online Harassment Event
headline.print_headline: In Reversal, SXSW Festival Plans Online Harassment Event

docs.snippet: The SXSW Interactive technology festival said Friday that it will hold an "online harassment summit" after it was criticized for bowing to threats and canceling two panels related to video games and online harassment....
docs.lead_paragraph: The SXSW Interactive technology festival said Friday that it will hold an "online harassment summit" after it was criticized for bowing to threats and canceling two panels related to video games and online harassment.

headline.main: Less Than 100 Roads, Bridges Remain Closed in South Carolina
headline.print_headline: Less Than 100 Roads, Bridges Remain Closed in South Carolina

docs.snippet: Fewer than 100 roads and bridges remain closed in South Carolina following this month's historic rains....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fewer than 100 roads and bridges remain closed in South Carolina following this month's historic rains.

headline.main: EPA May Ban Common Pesticide Used on Fruits and Vegetables
headline.print_headline: EPA May Ban Common Pesticide Used on Fruits and Vegetables

docs.snippet: A common pesticide used on citrus fruits, almonds and other crops would be banned under a proposal announced Friday by the Environmental Protection Agency....
docs.lead_paragraph: A common pesticide used on citrus fruits, almonds and other crops would be banned under a proposal announced Friday by the Environmental Protection Agency.

headline.main: Exiled Prosecutor Urges Sanctions on Venezuela
headline.print_headline: Exiled Prosecutor Urges Sanctions on Venezuela

docs.snippet: Venezuela's socialist officials consider him a traitor while the government's opponents say his long service to the regime should make him ineligible for U.S. political asylum. ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Venezuela's socialist officials consider him a traitor while the government's opponents say his long service to the regime should make him ineligible for U.S. political asylum.

headline.main: Atlanta Area Police Recover Stolen French Bulldog Puppies
headline.print_headline: Atlanta Area Police Recover Stolen French Bulldog Puppies

docs.snippet: Metro Atlanta police say they've recovered two French bulldog puppies stolen from the owner when she met with a person she thought was a prospective buyer....
docs.lead_paragraph: Metro Atlanta police say they've recovered two French bulldog puppies stolen from the owner when she met with a person she thought was a prospective buyer.

headline.main: White House Aware of Reports an American Was Detained in Iran
headline.print_headline: White House Aware of Reports an American Was Detained in Iran

docs.snippet: The White House is aware of reports that an Iranian-American businessman was detained while visiting Iran, spokesman Josh Earnest told reporters on Friday, referring questions about U.S. interactions on the issue to the State Department....
docs.lead_paragraph: The White House is aware of reports that an Iranian-American businessman was detained while visiting Iran, spokesman Josh Earnest told reporters on Friday, referring questions about U.S. interactions on the issue to the State Department.

headline.main: No Agreement on Assad's Fate at Syria Talks: Germany
headline.print_headline: No Agreement on Assad's Fate at Syria Talks: Germany

docs.snippet: There was no agreement at ministerial peace talks on Syria on Friday on what should happen with Syrian President Bashar al-Assad at the end of a political transition process, German Foreign Minister Frank-Walter Steinmeier said....
docs.lead_paragraph: There was no agreement at ministerial peace talks on Syria on Friday on what should happen with Syrian President Bashar al-Assad at the end of a political transition process, German Foreign Minister Frank-Walter Steinmeier said.

headline.main: U.S. to deploy special forces to Syria in advisory role
headline.sub: U.S. to deploy special forces to Syria in advisory role

docs.snippet: White House says the U.S. plans to deploy a small number of special operations forces to Syria to advise rebels Washington deems moderate. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)...
docs.lead_paragraph: White House says the U.S. plans to deploy a small number of special operations forces to Syria to advise rebels Washington deems moderate. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)

headline.main: UN Chief Condemns Iraq Attack Killing 26 Iranian Refugees
headline.print_headline: UN Chief Condemns Iraq Attack Killing 26 Iranian Refugees

docs.snippet: Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon is condemning the attack at an Iraqi camp housing Iranian refugees that killed at least 26 people and wounded many more....
docs.lead_paragraph: Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon is condemning the attack at an Iraqi camp housing Iranian refugees that killed at least 26 people and wounded many more.
